### Checklist

- [ ] Unity project successfully builds from root `yarn install` & `yarn build`
- [ ] Commits do not contain multiple scopes
- [ ] Add/updated examples
- [ ] Add/updated READMEs/docs
- [ ] No new console errors
- [ ] Accessibility checks
